alert.title: 💜 Your contribution is highly appreciated!
alert.description: Uploading materials and rating professors will help students like you succeed in the university.

course_box.title: Study Materials ✨
course_box.description: Share and find materials you need to help you succeed in your courses.

professor_box.title: Rate a Professor ⭐
professor_box.description: Learn about your professors from other students and rate their performance.

info.title: Information about UAEU Resources
info.paragraph1: UAEU Resources is a multi-purpose platform for UAEU students to prepare them during their studies. You can find and share materials for courses that are taken by the university's students.
info.paragraph2: Courses and professors data are collected from the University's official website. If a course/professor is missing,
info.paragraph3: Source code for this website is available on
